features.name: Voice of Authority
features.description: Choose a target within 30 ft. of you. The target may spend its reaction to make a basic attack against a target of your choice.

features.name: Sacred Flame
features.description: Spell: Cantrip, Evocation, VS. Save: DC 11 vs Dex, range 60 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d8) radiant damage.

features.name: Halt in the Name of Ionna
features.description: Spell: 1st-level, Enchantment, V. Save: DC 11 vs Cha, range 60 ft. one target. Hit: The target is Restrained until the end of your next turn.

features.name: Cure Wounds
features.description: Spell: 1st-level, Enchantment, VS. Utility: touch, a willing creature. Effect: The target regains 12 (2d8 +3) hit points.
